    For Cleverwood Feb. & Sept. 2014

  • Pinterest in Belgium blogpost 'trilogy'

    For Cleverwood April 2014

    A blogpost series about Pinterest in Belgium consisting of three parts (see links below), from which the first one required complex calculations with incomplete datasets, the second one used some free analytics tools and the third one is an interview with Belgian Pinfluencer Paulien.

    Visit:

    • Pt. 1: How big is the Belgian Pinterest userbase
    • Pt. 2: Demographics and Pinfluencers
